Feeling the crave?

Lets try deep controlled breathing!

This exercise will help you fight the crave to smoke through relaxation.
Kill the crave for smoke with deep breathing!
Aim for low Breaths Per Minute (BPM). 3-5 BPM is very good.
Straighten your back and use your diaphragm to breathe.
Inhale through your nose and exhale through your mouth.
Bring your mouth close to the microphone when breathing (within 10cm).
